panels.description: Shows the duration since an agent had last seen the leader. Spikes here may indicate network issues or a leader slowing or becoming unavailable.
panels.title: Consul Leader Seen

panels.description: This measures the time it takes to commit a new entry to the Raft log on the leader.
panels.title: Commit Time

panels.description: This counts the number of Raft transactions occurring over the interval, which is a general indicator of the write load on the Consul servers.
panels.title: Raft Transactions

panels.description: This measures the time it takes for the leader to write log entries to disk.
panels.title: Dispatch Log Time

list.description: Prometheus datasource used by this dashboard
list.label: Source
list.name: ds
